app.main.no-peer: Open Misadrop on other devices to send files
app.main.error-transfer: Invalid file or receiver does not exist
app.modal.description: Misadrop is a free web app that allows you to easily and securely share files directly between devices without uploading them to any server first.
app.modal.security: We do not store any data. Your data will be transmitted directly over the P2P connection.
